discipline.name: Obfuscate
discipline.overview: Obfuscate is a power that allows the Kindred to hide easily, move without being noticed, and cast illusions. It gives users the ability to get close to victims or disguise themselves as well as give them an out when a situation gets too complicated. The power itself is not invisibility, instead, it works through mental magic, tricking the mind of others to ignore the kindred presence or see a mundane face instead. Unless otherwise stated Obfuscate affects all five senses and coaxes victims to step out of the way to the point of rationalizing to themselves about why they are avoiding that particular corner. However, there are limitations to this power. The power will fail if the victim cannot ignore the user such as being backed into a corner or being blocked from a doorway they wish to walk through. As well as violent actions, loud noises or failed rolls to tamper with items. Without Ghost in the Machine, the kindred is easily recognized by machine surveillance. Users of Sense the Unseen, are able to roll against these powers, as well as those about to be struck by a sneak attack. Without the use of Vanish, users are unable to use Obfuscate while under observation from others.

level1.name: Cloak of Shadows
level1.effect: As long as the user stands still they blend into their surroundings
level1.notes: Follows the general rules for Obfuscate

level1.name: Ensconce
level1.effect: Make others ignore small objects that are held on the vampire's body
level1.notes: Sense Unseen can pierce this power

level1.name: Silence of Death
level1.effect: Nullifies the sounds a user makes
level1.notes: This power does not eliminate powers made outside of the user's personal space

level2.name: Cache
level2.effect: Hide objects that are not held by the vampire
level2.notes: This can be extended for the duration of the night with an extra rouse check

level2.name: Chimestry
level2.notes: This can be used in combat but can only affect targets once per conflict
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 76

level2.name: Ghost's Passing
level2.effect: The user can bestow Obfuscate onto an animal's tracks
level2.notes: Sense the Unseen can discern signs as per general Obfuscate rules
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Forbidden Religions, page 18

level2.name: Unseen Passage
level2.effect: The user can now move while remaining hidden
level2.notes: This power will fail if the user is being actively watched when activated

level2.name: Ventriloquism
level2.effect: Throw their voice so only the intended recipient can hear it
level2.notes: Can be used on anyone in line of sight
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Fall of London, page 148

level2.name: Doubletalk
level2.effect: Say one thing but convey something else in secret
level2.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Blood Stained Love, page 152

level3.name: Fata Morgana
level3.duration: One scene, unless let to lapse
level3.notes: If the hallucination can trigger Frenzy, give the test at 1 diff lower than the real thing
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 77

level3.name: Ghost in the Machine
level3.effect: Allows the effects of Obfuscate to be transmitted through technology when viewed on a live screen
level3.notes: If viewed later the image seems blurred, making identification harder

level3.name: Mask of a Thousand Faces
level3.effect: Make themselves appear as a mundane face rather than disappear allowing interaction and communication
level3.notes: This power allows them to interact and speak to others around them

level3.name: Mask of Isolation
level3.effect: Force Mask of a Thousand Faces onto a victim
level3.duration: One night plus one additional night per margin of success
level3.notes: Should the user be made aware of the power being used on them the effects end
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Sabbat: The Black Hand, page 48

level3.name: Mental Maze
level3.effect: Remove all sense of direction and location from a victim in a location
level3.notes: Eye contact is required to active the power
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 77

level3.name: Mind Masque
level3.effect: Hide and replace emotions and thoughts against those who wish to read them through supernatural means
level3.notes: The difficulty to mask their emotion depends on how complicated they want the ruse to be
level3.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 78

level4.name: Conceal
level4.duration: One night plus one additional night per margin of success
level4.notes: This power cannot affect anything larger than a two-story house or anything moving on it's own

level4.name: Vanish
level4.effect: Activate Cloak of Shadows or Unseen Passage while being observed
level4.notes: This power makes the memory of the Kindred foggy and indistinct, but it will not affect the memories of vampires

level5.name: Cloak the Gathering
level5.cost: One Rouse Check in additional to the cost of the power extended
level5.notes: This power extends to a number of people equal to the user's Wits, plus additional Rouse Checks

level5.name: Impostor's Guise
level5.notes: The face they wish to copy must be studied for at least five minutes from multiple angles

amalgams.name: Unliving Hive
amalgams.effect: Extend animal influence to swarms of insects

amalgams.name: True Love's Face
amalgams.effect: The victim will perceive the user as a mortal they have strong emotional ties with, be it hatred or love
amalgams.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Cults of the Blood Gods, page 85

amalgams.name: Unseen Strike
amalgams.effect: Vanish, blink forwards, and surprise attack an enemy
amalgams.source: Vampire: The Masquerade Players Guide, page 73
